mapper.select:
select sum(w.gb_device_online) as gbDeviceOnline,sum(w.gb_device_all) as gbDeviceAll, sum(w.light_device_online) as lightDeviceOnline,sum(w.light_device_all) as lightDeviceAll, sum(w.LED_device_online) as LEDDeviceOnline,sum(w.LED_device_all) as LEDDeviceAll, sum(w.hjjc_device_online) as hjjcDeviceOnline,sum(w.hjjc_device_all) as hjjcDeviceAll from tj_wisdomlamp as w inner join ht_xq_wy as xw on w.xq_code=xw.xq_code and xw.status=0 inner join ht_wy_info as wy on xw.wy_code=wy.wy_code inner join ht_xq_info xq on w.xq_code=xq.code inner join (select area_id from ht_area where parent_ids like concat('%',#{params.areaId},'%')) area on area.area_id=xq.sso_regionalcode where 1=1
and w.xq_code in (${params.xqCode})
and wy.wy_code in (${params.wyCode})
